column5: Has anybody been to the Cabela's Spring Expo in the past. My father went there last year. He picked up a bunch of stuff for Canandian$ at PAR! Can anybody confirm that this is happening againg this year. I will probably be there anyway. I'm refering to the East Grand Forks location.Fish ON!!

I know that in the past few years that this has been every spring. I am not sure of the date, but check your local paper. In the last couple of years it has been in the Winnipeg Fre Press. If you can't wait, try contacting them thru their website at: www.cabelas.com. Hope this is of some help.Alan D

Update Cabela's at Par dates have been set at April 12 and 13. This is at the store in East Grand Forks, MN. It encompasses the Bargan Cave and Descontinued items. Hope this is of some help to you. Alan D
